title: JavaScript Interview Question Pack
fullDescription: A carefully curated collection of JavaScript interview questions covering fundamentals, ES6+, closures, async programming, and common real-world scenarios. Ideal for frontend and full-stack developers preparing for technical interviews.
author: StudyShelf Team

title: React Fundamentals Notes
shortDescription: Concise notes covering React core concepts.
fullDescription: This resource explains React fundamentals such as components, JSX, props, state, hooks, and conditional rendering in a simple and beginner-friendly way. Perfect for learners starting their React journey.
author: StudyShelf Team

title: Data Structures Cheat Sheet
shortDescription: Quick reference for common data structures.
fullDescription: A one-stop cheat sheet covering arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, and hash tables with time complexities and use cases. Designed for fast revision before exams or interviews.
author: StudyShelf Team

title: System Design Basics Guide
fullDescription: An introductory guide to system design covering scalability, load balancing, databases, caching, and basic architectural patterns. Ideal for students preparing for entry-level system design interviews.
author: StudyShelf Team

title: CSS Layout Mastery
shortDescription: Flexbox and Grid explained with examples.
fullDescription: A practical guide to mastering CSS layouts using Flexbox and Grid. Includes visual examples, common layout patterns, and responsive design techniques used in modern web applications.
author: StudyShelf Team

title: Git & GitHub Essentials
fullDescription: Learn Git and GitHub from scratch, including repositories, branches, commits, pull requests, and collaboration workflows. Essential knowledge for every developer.
author: StudyShelf Team

title: Frontend Developer Roadmap
fullDescription: A visual and structured roadmap outlining the skills, tools, and technologies required to become a frontend developer, from HTML & CSS to frameworks and performance optimization.
author: StudyShelf Team

title: Node.js Fundamentals
fullDescription: Covers Node.js fundamentals including modules, event loop, file system, and basic API concepts. Suitable for frontend developers transitioning into backend development.
author: StudyShelf Team

title: SQL Query Practice Set
fullDescription: A collection of real-world SQL problems covering SELECT, JOINs, subqueries, indexes, and optimization techniques. Designed to strengthen database query skills.
author: StudyShelf Team

title: Behavioral Interview Preparation Guide
fullDescription: This guide focuses on behavioral interview questions, STAR method answers, communication tips, and confidence-building strategies commonly used in tech interviews.
author: StudyShelf Team

title: API Design Best Practices
shortDescription: Learn how to design clean APIs.
fullDescription: Explains RESTful API design principles, naming conventions, error handling, versioning, and security best practices with real-world examples.
author: StudyShelf Team

title: Study & Productivity Planner
fullDescription: A printable and digital planner designed to help students manage study time, set goals, track progress, and maintain productivity during long study periods.
author: StudyShelf Team
